Verses: 1 yesu Indha Vasanangalai Sollimudiththa Pinbu, Avar Galileyaavai Vittu Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyaana Yoodheyaavin Ellaigalil Vandhaar.
2 thiralaana Janangal Avarukkup Pin Sendraargal; Avvidaththil Avargalai Sosthamaakkinaar.
3 appozhudhu, Pariseyar Avarai Sodhikkavendumendru Avaridaththil Vandhu: Purushanaanavan Than Manaiviyai Endha Mugaandharaththinaalaagilum Thallividuvadhu Niyaayamaa Endru Kettaargal.
4 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Aadhiyile Manusharai Undaakkinavar Avargalai Aanum Pennumaaga Undaakkinaar Enpadhaiyum,

5 idhinimiththam Purushanaanavan Than Thagappanaiyum Thaayaiyum Vittuth Than Manaiviyode Isaindhiruppaan; Avargal Iruvarum Ore Maamsamaayiruppaargal Endru Avar Sonnadhaiyum, Neengal Vaasikkavillaiyaa?
6 ippadi Irukkirapadiyaal, Avargal Iruvaraayiraamal, Ore Maamsamaayirukkiraargal; Aagaiyaal, Dhevan Inaiththadhai Manushan Pirikkaadhirukkakkadavan Endraar.
7 adharku Avargal: Appadiyaanaal, Thalludharseettaikkoduththu, Avalaith Thallividalaamendru Mose En Kattalaiyittaar Endraargal.
8 adharku Avar: Ungal Manaivigalaith Thallividalaamendru Ungal Irudhayakkadinaththinimiththam Mose Ungalukku Idam Koduththaar; Aadhimudhalaai Appadi Irukkavillai.

9 aadhalaal, Evanaagilum Than Manaivi Vesiththananjeydhadhinimiththameyandri, Avalaith Thallivittu Veroruththiyai Vivaagam Panninaal, Avan Vibachaaram Pannugiravanaayiruppaan; Thallividappattavalai Vivaagam Pannugiravanum Vibachaaranjeykiravanaayiruppaan Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
10 avarudaiya Seeshargal Avarai Nokki: Manaiviyaippatrip Purushanudaiya Kaariyam Ippadiyirundhaal, Vivaagam Pannugiradhu Nalladhalla Endraargal.
11 adharku Avar: Varam Petravargale Thavira Matravargal Indha Vasanaththai Etrukkollamaattaargal.

12 thaayin Vayitrilirundhu Annagargalaaip Pirandhavargalum Undu; Manushargalaal Annagargalaakkappattavargalum Undu; Paralogaraajyaththinimiththam Thangalai Annagargalaakkikkondavargalum Undu; Idhai Etrukkolla Vallavan Etrukkollakkadavan Endraar.
13 appozhudhu, Siru Pillaigalinmel Kaigalai Vaiththu Jebampannupadikku Avargalai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal; Konduvandhavargalai Seeshargal Adhattinaargal.
14 yesuvo: Siru Pillaigal Ennidaththil Varugiradharku Idangodungal; Avargalaith Thadaipannaadhirungal; Paralogaraajyam Appadippattavargaludaiyadhu Endru Solli,
15 avargal Mel Kaigalai Vaiththu, Pinbu Avvidam Vittup Purappattupponaar.
16 appozhudhu Oruvan Vandhu, Avarai Nokki: Nalla Podhagare, Niththiya Jeevanai Adaiyumpadi Naan Endha Nanmaiyai Seyyavendum Endru Kettaan;
17 adharku Avar: Nee Ennai Nallavan Endru Solvaanen? Dhevan Oruvaraiththavira Nallavan Oruvanum Illaiye; Nee Jeevanil Piravesikka Virumbinaal Karpanaigalaik Kaikkol Endraar.
18 avan Avarai Nokki: Evaigalai Endru Kettaan. Adharku Yesu: Kolai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Vibachaaram Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kalavu Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Poich Saatchi Sollaadhiruppaayaaga;
19 un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Kanampannuvaayaaga; Unnidaththil Nee Anbukooruvadhupolap Piranidaththilum Anbukooruvaayaaga Enpavaigalaiye Endraar.
20 andha Vaaliban Avarai Nokki: Ivaigalaiyellaam En Siru Vayadhu Mudhal Kaikkondirukkiren; Innum Ennidaththil Kuraivu Enna Endraan.

21 adharku Yesu: Nee Poorana Sargunanaayirukka Virumpinaal, Poi, Unakku Undaanavaikalai Vitru, Thariththirarukkuk Kodu, Appozhudhu Paralogaththil Unakkup Pokkisham Undaayirukkum. Pinbu Ennaip Pinpatrivaa Endraar.
22 andha Vaaliban Migundha Aasthiyullavanaayirundhapadiyaal, Indha Vaarththaiyaik Kettapozhudhu, Thukkamadaindhavanaaip Poivittaan.
23 appozhudhu, Yesu Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Aisuvariyavaan Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesippadhu Aridhendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
24 melum Aisuvariyavaan Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesippadhaippaarkkilum, Ottagamaanadhu Oosiyin Kaadhile Nuzhaivadhu Elidhaayirukkum Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
25 avarudaiya Seeshargal Adhaikkettapozhudhu Migavum Aachchariyappattu: Appadiyaanaal Yaar Ratchikkappadakkoodum Endraargal.
26 yesu, Avargalaip Paarththu: Manusharaal Idhu Koodaadhathudhaan; Dhevanaale Ellaam Koodum Endraar.
27 appozhudhu Pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Idho, Naangal Ellaavatraiyum Vittu, Ummaippinpatrinome; Engalukku Ennakidaikkum Endraan.

28 adharku Yesu: Marujenmakaalaththile Manushakumaaran Thammudaiya Magimaiyulla Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkumpodhu, Neengalum, Isravelin Pannirandu Koththirangalaiyum Niyaayam Theerkkiravargalaagap Pannirandu Singaasanangalinmel Veetriruppeergal Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.

29 en Naamaththinimiththam Veettaiyaavadhu, Sagodhararaiyaavadhu, Sagodharigalaiyaavadhu, Thagappanaiyaavadhu, Thaayaiyaavadhu, Manaiviyaiyaavadhu, Pillaigalaiyaavadhu, Nilangalaiyaavadhu Vittavan Evano, Avan Nooraththanaiyaai Adaindhu, Niththiya Jeevanaiyum Sudhandhariththukkolluvaan;
30 aagilum, Mundhinor Anegar Pindhinoraayum, Pindhinor Anegar Mundhinoraayum Iruppaargal Endraar.
